StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SSRS_ONEO.cerSelec.onBoardResults]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @BOARDID VARCHAR(500) --@BOARDID INT ) AS BEGIN --Gather the Test Scores for Candidates assigned to the Board SELECT MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID ,MC.GENDER_CODE ,OC.CONTRACT_ID ,OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID ,B.BOARD_ID ,NULL AS 'SAT' ,NULL AS 'ACT' ,PFT1.PFT_SCORE ,OC.CONTRACT_GPA ,CA.AFQT_SCORE INTO #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PFT PFT1 ON N.NWA_ID = PFT1.NWA_ID AND PFT_ID = (SELECT MAX(PFT_ID) FROM PFT PFT2 WHERE PFT2.NWA_ID = PFT1.NWA_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CA.ASVAB_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(CA2.ASVAB_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA2 WHERE CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CA2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID) WHERE --B.BOARD_ID = @BOARDID B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1
--SAT UPDATE #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS SET SAT = CPE.EXAM_SCORE FROM #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS STAT INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM CPE ON STAT.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CPE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE CPE.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = 'S' --ACT UPDATE #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS SET ACT = CPE.EXAM_SCORE FROM #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS STAT INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM CPE ON STAT.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = CPE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE CPE.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = 'T'
--Return the counts and averages SELECT B.FRIENDLY_NAME ,B.BOARD_DATE ,COUNT(*) AS 'NUM ELIGIBLE'
-- Male Eligible ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M') THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM MALE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE MALE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') ) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK MALE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC MALE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER MALE ELIGIBLE' --Female Eligible ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F') THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM FEMALE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE FEMALE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') ) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK FEMALE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC FEMALE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER FEMALE ELIGIBLE' --Race Eligible ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') ) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC ELIGIBLE' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS')) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER ELIGIBLE' --Selec.on Totals ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ((OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM NON-SELECTED' --Male Selected ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM MALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE MALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK MALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC MALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER MALE SELECTED' --Female Selected ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM FEMALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE FEMALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK FEMALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC FEMALE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER FEMALE SELECTED' --Race Selected ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER SELECTED' --Male Non-Selected ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM MALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE MALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK MALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC MALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER MALE NON-SELECTED' --Female Non-Selected ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM FEMALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE FEMALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK FEMALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC FEMALE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN (MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER FEMALE NON-SELECTED' --Race Non-Selected ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM WHITE NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('CA','CB','CF','CZ') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM BLACK NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) IN ('A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM HISPANIC NON-SELECTED' ,COUNT(CASE WHEN ( (MC.RACE_CODE + MC.ETHNIC_CODE) NOT IN ('EP','ES','ET','EZ','CA','CB','CF','CZ','A1','A4','A6','A9','B1','B4','B6','B9','C1','C4','C6','C9', 'D1','D4','D6','D9','E1','E4','E6','E9','F1','F4','F6','F9','AS','BS','CS','DS','FS') AND (OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4)) THEN 1 END) AS 'NUM OTHER NON-SELECTED' --Race Selected ,AVG(STAT.SAT) AS 'OVERALL_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_SAT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.SAT END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_SAT' ,AVG(STAT.ACT) AS 'OVERALL_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_ACT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.ACT END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_ACT' ,AVG(STAT.PFT_SCORE) AS 'OVERALL_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_PFT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.PFT_SCORE END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_PFT' ,AVG(STAT.CONTRACT_GPA) AS 'OVERALL_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_GPA' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.CONTRACT_GPA END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_GPA' ,AVG(STAT.AFQT_SCORE) AS 'OVERALL_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'OVERALL_MALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'OVERALL_FEMALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'SELECTED_MALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 5 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'SELECTED_FEMALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'M' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_MALE_AFQT' ,AVG(CASE WHEN STAT.BOARD_STATUS_ID = 4 AND MC.GENDER_CODE = 'F' THEN STAT.AFQT_SCORE END) AS 'NON-SELECTED_FEMALE_AFQT' FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD OCB ON B.BOARD_ID = OCB.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT OC ON OCB.OFFICER_CONTRACT_ID = OC.CONTRACT_ID INNER JOIN OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH ON OCB.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID AND OCBSH.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH.STATUS_DATE IN (SELECT MAX(STATUS_DATE) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_BOARD_STATUS_HISTORY OCBSH2 WHERE OCBSH2.BOARD_STATUS_ID IN (3,4,5) AND OCBSH2.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID = OCBSH.CONTRACT_BOARD_ID) INNER JOIN NWA N ON OC.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS STAT ON STAT.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE B.BOARD_ID IN (select * from dbo.SplitList(@BOARDID,',')) --B.BOARD_ID = @BOARDID and OC.BOARD_STATUS_ID > 1 GROUP BY B.FRIENDLY_NAME ,B.BOARD_DATE --Cleanup DROP TABLE #RPTOFCBOARDSTATISTICS
END
